entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 3:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
